MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.SdcaBinaryClassificationExtensions.StochasticDualCoordinateAscent (ctx, label, features, weights, loss, l2Const, l1Threshold, maxIterations, advancedSettings)

Docs.param: The binary classification context trainer object.
The custom loss. Defaults to log-loss if not specified.
The L1 regularization hyperparameter. Higher values will tend to lead to more sparse model.
The maximum number of passes to perform over the data.
A delegate to set more settings.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a linear binary classification model trained with the SDCA trainer.
